document.full_text: the owners of three of the largest internet poker companies operating in the united states were accused on friday of tricking regulators and banks into processing billions of dollars of illegal internet gambling proceeds.
document.title: internet gambling sites owners charged with fraud
lines_and_colors: the owners of three of the largest internet poker companies operating in the united states were accused on friday of tricking regulators and banks into processing billions of dollars of illegal internet gambling proceeds.
